snippet.title: Parisian Brasserie Simulator - Demo Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3058360/Parisian_Brasserie_Simulator/

Manage your own brasserie in Paris and turn it into the place to be! Create menus, serve customers, and master every detail to grow your restaurant. Manage supplies, ensure top-notch service, and make your mark on the city of lights. Will you become the next Parisian brasserie institution?

Discord: https://discord.gg/8gMv4r6eYC
Twitter: https://x.com/StudiosQuark
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/studiosquark/
Site: https://quarkstudios.fr/
